name: Palmystery
description:
A surreal horror cartoon video game by Paloma "Palgal" Dawkins about communicating with hands. Featuring a scene designed by Keith Jones. In the Mac version the final level features  Aya Avalon's poem "The Garden". In the Windows version the final scene is Aphrodite Affirmations by Andrea Young

Music by
Neo Edo
https://www.facebook.com/neoedoneo/?fref=ts

Snowboarder/Karneef
https://soundcloud.com/karneef

YlangYlang
https://ylangylang.bandcamp.com/

Eccinaccea
